Then there are specific examples given where different individuals have different views on terrorism. For instance, one person supports the actions of the attackers, while another takes the opposite stance, believing that killing is never justified.

In the example provided, the answer was 'Esperanza Maldonado' because she spoke out in favor of the attackers, stating that their actions are justified. On the other hand, Zeinab al-Balushi took the opposing view, supporting the idea that killing is never justified.

So applying this to the question at hand: Esperanza Maldonado supports the actions of the terrorists, while Zeinab al-Balushi does not. Therefore, based on their statements, the one who supports terrorism would be Esperanza Maldonado.
